cause.description:
MDA is Help: Through clinics, research, and summer camps.
MDA is Hope: Research and clinical trials working to find treatments and cures
MDA is Knowledge: Knowledge about Muscular Dystrophy
The Muscular Dystrophy Association is a national voluntary health agency dedicated to conquering more than 40 neuromuscular diseases that affect a million Americans of all ages. (www.mdausa.org)
1. Neuromuscular diseases affect the quality of life for too many people
2. Spread the word about MDA across the nation
3. Support the MDA and Jerry's Kids through knowledge dissemination and fundraising
cause.mission: support the goals of the Muscular Dystrophy Association through knowledge and donations.
cause.name: Muscular Dystrophy Association of the United States of America
